You are here: [Welcome Home] > [HtmlReference HTML Reference] > [CharacterEntities Character entities] > [CharacterEntitiesT T] > &tcy;

== Value ==

There are 2 variations of this entity:

  * `&Tcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0422/index.htm U+00422].
  * `&tcy;` maps to the Unicode character [http://www.fileformat.info/info/unicode/char/0442/index.htm U+00442].
